scene_description_enriched: The scene depicts the Visitation, with the Virgin Mary, clad in a blue robe and gold halo, meeting Elizabeth, who wears a dark garment and a white veil, also with a gold halo. They are holding hands, suggesting a moment of greeting and recognition. Behind them, to the left, is a stylized blue and gold tower. To the right, a stone building with arched openings and crenellations is visible. The background features a green landscape with hints of rocky formations and a blue sky. The overall composition is framed by an ornamental border.
